'''''Amon Hen'' 95''' is the ninety-fifth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in January [[1989]].

** By: Tom Sherry

** By: [[Christina Scull]]

** By: Richard and Sarah Sturch
* Artwork: ''Haleth, daughter of Haldad''
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
